website_summaries.verdict: A luxurious bath mat that stands out for its excellent quality and plush design.
pros: In addition to its high-quality construction, this mat dries very quickly, making it perfect for any bathroom
It's also easy to wash and comfortable as well as attractive
cons: Some felt the size of this mat was too small, and a few wished the color selection was bigger

customer_reviews.title: Magical drying capacity!
customer_reviews.text: Love this rug. My pet peeve is getting out of the shower after my husband has already showered, and standing on a wet rug. This dries instantly almost. Would love if it had more padding, but I am happy to trade for the dry rug feel.
customer_reviews.author: Soclean

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT put in dryer! Comfy, absorbent
customer_reviews.text: Four months later: This rug continues to perform exactly as advertised. It's soft, absorbent, and grippy. Do NOT put in the dryer. There's a layer of foam in the center, and it disintegrated in the dryer, getting over everything. This left the mat looking saggy and wrinkly. To be fair, the tag does indicate NO DRYER. This was a bummer because I ordered a Gorilla Grip Luxury Chanille mat in the same shipment, and for a dollar more, that mat looks and feels similar, but CAN be put in the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew L

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY .
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy . It stays wet and gets moldy . Gonna try and send back . Very disappointed .
customer_reviews.author: L. Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Great rug for the bathroom
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you can't beat it. The rug arrived quickly, and feels plush and comfy to stand on. It does not shed, and is a great size to put in front of your sink or bath/shower. Highly recommend. The gray color is true to the picture
customer_reviews.author: mommyinthecity

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I like this mat alot. It is way softer than i imagined, and the material really absorbs wet feet when you step out of the shower. I havent vacuumed it, nor do i envision doing it soon, so not sure how easy it will be to clean. But for the purpose i got it, i love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amir

customer_reviews.title: Such a good value for these soft, absorbent mats
customer_reviews.text: Oh I forgot I bought these and that they needed to be reviewed. I forgot them because they do their job, are soft, and don’t bunch up. I’m not frustrated with them being wet hours later, or bunching up and not lying flat. I’ve washed them a few times and haven’t noticed anything off about them thus far
customer_reviews.author: Drew D

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this....soft and the gray color is perfect! Can’t say how it will hold up in the wash yet but will update if it doesn’t fare well...everything else is good.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Colors Incorrect
customer_reviews.text: Inconsistent coloring despite same brand. Even bought a 2 pack and the colors were different. Love the absorbency and softness. Hate that all 4 rugs purchased are off on coloring.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Came in a really nice package, so the first impression was good. Soaks up water well and so does it's job. I wish they had mire colors to choose from but the grey one is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Shivani Kaw

customer_reviews.title: Super soft!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great rug! Very soft and absorbs the water immediately. Hangs over the tub to dry. I haven't had any issues so far, so I'm pretty pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bath mats
customer_reviews.text: I love these bath mats, I ordered more of them. They stay in place, wash easily and absorb moisture, they stay in place well
customer_reviews.author: Helen Shipstad

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Good item, it is soft and not prone to getting visibly dirty. Wish the larger one was priced at what this one was priced at.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Functional
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rug for our main bathroom several months ago and I love it! It is very soft and comfortable to stand on and we have had no issues keeping it clean. It doesn't get soaking wet or anything and really doesn't trap dirt too bad. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect rug!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, great price. Low profile rug is perfect fit outside the shower
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Sufficient for what I need
customer_reviews.text: The rugs are good. I thought they would be more plush. They are sufficient and the grey is neutral enough, that it works in both bathrooms. Comfortable to stand on in bare feet.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: The Better Bath Mat
customer_reviews.text: Great product for an amazing price. This is well made and does not come apart. The material is soft and the gray color is dark enough to not show dirt but light enough for a more pleasing aesthetic.
customer_reviews.author: David Patrick Faustina

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Love that i can just throw this in the wash
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth.S.Zhirnov

customer_reviews.title: I thought they would be longer like a different shaggy chenille rug I have
customer_reviews.text: This was ok but the tufts or strands are very short, I thought they would be longer like a different shaggy chenille rug I have. But it work well for the bath.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Accurately described with non skid backing. Bonus is it dries quickly even when left on floor after a shower. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: L. Whittaker

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I just love my new bath mat! It is very well constructed and simply gorgeous! High quality, beautiful workmanship, packaged well and shipped in a very reasonable time. Easy to clean, washed by machine for several times, came out as new. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: mydayboys

customer_reviews.title: Bathroom
customer_reviews.text: It’s soft and seems to absorb water well, considering I have two girls.
customer_reviews.author: TimandNat

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Soft as described but is a bit smaller than the larger one I had. Still great for a small bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Gaston Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Full of silver fish
customer_reviews.text: Id give it no stars if i could. Delivery was perfect as usual, loved the color and texture. But from day 1 I saw a silverfish. Next couple of weeks 2 to 4 more. Then maybe 1 a week. They are hard to see with the little bubby texture. Tonight I saw at least 6. I started pushing apart the nubs and there were dozens! We have an occasional spider or cricket in the house but silver fish, never. They are nowhere else. I won't return it, I just rolled it up and threw it in the outside trash. I've never seen anything like it. So gross. Can't believe it took me this long.
customer_reviews.author: ellen pittard

customer_reviews.title: This was such a great deal. It was on sale -- and it ...
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great deal. It was on sale -- and it is very soft and thick. It was for my elderly mom's bathroom. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Fozard

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre rug at best
customer_reviews.text: Got super loose after 1 wash, so now it looks all bunched up on the ground. Not very absorbent
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great rug
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my elderly dad for outside of the shower. It has a nonskid bottom and doesn’t move. It is super soft and absorbent. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dora Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product, would buy again, definitely no slipping if you're concerned about that.
customer_reviews.author: christine coderre

customer_reviews.title: it's a nice rug - built well and comfy
customer_reviews.text: it's a nice rug - built well and comfy. not as plush as I'd hoped - but my dog lays on it every day so that must say something LOL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low profile, dries quickly, really soft and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. Not super plush, but soft enough and dries quickly. Low profile is great for my small bathroom and the door swings over it easily with no snag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good bath rug at a good price, only wish had more color options
customer_reviews.author: Nish

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So happy I got this. Now my girlfriend doesn’t wet my whole bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Lugo Fitness

customer_reviews.title: Stays dry
customer_reviews.text: Stays drier than any bath mat I have ever used
customer_reviews.author: Ezgi Yagci

customer_reviews.title: Kind of a gritty feel
customer_reviews.text: Has kind of a gritty feel. Not as plush/soft feeling as I would have l liked. Does the job though.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Liebner

customer_reviews.title: and I've put it through the washer and drier a few times and it's still good as new
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed by this mat! It's soft, it doesn't slip at all, and I've put it through the washer and drier a few times and it's still good as new. It's on the small side, but not too small.
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: Great rugs
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Rugs stay put. Quickly dry and are a great size.
customer_reviews.author: Grim Girl

customer_reviews.title: Light grey
customer_reviews.text: I order these and the larger size from this vendor, both in grey, but the grey colors do not match. The smaller rugs are a much lighter grey. The rugs themselves are okay.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Even prettier in real than on photos
customer_reviews.text: It looks beautiful in my home. I was planning to use it as the bathtub mat, however, my cat loves it really much, lol, I think I will but another one for bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jordi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have bought many of these for every bathroom. It's very soft and stays looking new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this rug
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this rug. Super absorbing and dries quickly. Wet floors drive me crazy and this rug calms my wet floor anxiety.its a great size as well
customer_reviews.author: alexa

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I would suggest washing once before use to get the mat on the bottom to grip the floor better.
customer_reviews.author: Talisa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Very soft under my feet and absorbent. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: MD85

customer_reviews.title: We are delighted with this beautiful rug!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous rug! I used it in my bathroom and get compliments all the time! Very good quality and excellent shipping. I'm really happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart when washed
customer_reviews.text: Very absorbant but I washed it once and now the backing is loose and rug won't lay flat. Won't buy again because of that
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely stunning!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely could not be happier! Came is perfect packing, rug is more beautiful than I imagined it would turn out to be, best online shopping experience!
customer_reviews.author: Lidia Lulio

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this mat! Great quality and exactly what I was looking for. Easy to wash and drys fast!!!
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: This rug looks great in my bathroom and is easy to take care of.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Eiskant

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality. Came in nice packing and laid flat immediately. Very happy with my purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Comes In Handy When You're All Wet
customer_reviews.text: I used to use a carpet remnant as a bathroom mat. Gag. The carpet was always damp, and there was nothing to keep it in place on the floor. So for the past month I've been using the LIFEWIT BATH MAT. This product is the real deal. It's soft, absorbent, dries quickly, and with its rubber bottom surface this mat's not going anywhere. Plus it looks good. I'm not sure why I put up with a lousy carpet remnant for so long when with just a handful of dollars I could enjoy the LIFEWIT BATH MAT. But then, brains have never been my strong suit. ~D. Mikels, Esq.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mikels

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Lovely and good quality. Soft to stand on - bouncy and soft - washes brilliantly.
customer_reviews.author: ursachidayanaelena

customer_reviews.title: Great on bare feet no slippage on linoleum floor
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping! Great on bare feet no slippage on linoleum floor.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Huston

customer_reviews.title: superb water asorbent rug
customer_reviews.text: Attached 2 photos, really a good bath mat, quickly absorbed water from my feet, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Angella

customer_reviews.title: Very soft
customer_reviews.text: This bath map is lovely and plush--I like to sink my toes into it when I step out of the shower. It also heavy enough that it stays spread well and doesn't bunch.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: so far so good. no bad smell, enough to use in bath room
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice rug! It does indeed feel really soft and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice rug! It does indeed feel really soft and dries quickly. I'm planning to buy a second one!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great mat. I got 2
customer_reviews.text: Clean look and comfy for the feet. I liked it so much, I got a second.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C.

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, could be better
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this -- a good use for recycled plastic bottles! However, I found this mat to be somewhat soft but VERY lumpy! I believe the tufts may be just too far apart to feel smooth under foot. FWIW, it also doesn't drape over the side of the tub well, it's much too stiff. I will probably go back to a cushy fabric mat with a grippy rubber back which doesn't skid or fail to drape over the tub.
customer_reviews.author: dobltrobl

customer_reviews.title: This is It, great Bath Mat ~
customer_reviews.text: Made my day! This is an awesome bath mat, nice size and the design surely impressed me, intend to order a second. This a gift for my spousal unit, and he loved it! He keeps throwing my good towels on the floor to step on, this puts a stop to that. This mat will not be a water soaked puddle that leaves footprints. Thank You for this item.
customer_reviews.author: nvj3wlv

customer_reviews.title: I think this is excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: I think this is excellent for the price. At a store, this would cost about double so you're getting a good deal. It's very simple, no fancy thick memory foam. It seems to absorb water well, it's a good size, and keeps the feet warm. I've had it for about a week so I don't know how long it will hold up but hopefully it will hold up for awhile. Atleast until I get sick of the color :) I got the gray and it is the true color that is shown in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: dasha

customer_reviews.title: Hesitant at first but REALLY happy!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy these at first because based on the photos I really do not like the way these types of bath mats look. since most other bath mats use the same material and look the same I decided to try it out. I'm glad I did because they ended up being so soft an absorbent there are the best bath mats I've ever had. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ABTraveler

customer_reviews.title: Fits well under low door clearances
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to fit under my low clearance door and it’s perfect. Any thicker and it wouldn’t have fit. Right off the bat - very comfortable and fun to step on. My kids broke a bath bomb over it, so it was hard to get the particles out, but I vacuumed over it and it worked. Can’t say yet about it’s absorbency.
customer_reviews.author: TesPot

customer_reviews.title: Dries fast
customer_reviews.text: Tired of bath mats that keep moisture for too long and start molding, I decided to give this microfiber mat a try. It absorbs well and best of all, dries really fast. I'm not walking onto a soggy mat the next day. It's not the most luxurious looking mat, but it does its job well.
customer_reviews.author: J Y

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: it's a mat, I know, but this ticks the boxes for us, not so long a pile that it either catches on the bottom of the bathroom door, or too flat and hard, stays in position, doesn't trap dirt or bits and pieces, easy to wash, feels nice under foot and looks good, will buy for other bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: billy

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I'm getting older and my balance isn't what it used to be. I decided I needed to replace slippery bath mats and this looked like the right one after reading many online reviews of various products. Works perfectly: doesn't move when I step on it, soft and absorbent, easy to clean. We ordered one for my wife afterwards and she agrees. What a difference!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but awful after first cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Pro: the gray color is nice, the texture is good, machine washable Cons: after the first wash in cold water, the rug lost its shape. There was this permanent crease in the middle that would never flatten. The mesh on the bottom became worn out quickly. I think the one at IKEA would be better bet to buy. I ended up throwing it out after a few washes.
customer_reviews.author: LJ Lee

customer_reviews.title: So soft and a great size!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our bathroom and LOVE it! It feels so nice on your feet and is really easy to clean--no issues just tossing it in the washer and dryer. It lays perfectly flat on the floor, and the little nubs have stayed soft through multiple washes. A great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan C.

customer_reviews.title: Ok for temporary use, but not long term
customer_reviews.text: Liked this at first, but after a few washes (and months) it just wasn't the same anymore unfortunately. Got gross and yellow on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: thehuskymom

customer_reviews.title: Great rug that stays in place and is non-slip
customer_reviews.text: Great rug that stays in place and is non-slip. I bought this item a few days back and I like it so far. It feels similar to those from IKEA but it absorbs water better and I personally like the color more. I put it in my bathroom right in front of the entry of the shower. It helps keep the floor dry all time.
customer_reviews.author: Na Man

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't thrilled with it, but my concerns were taken care of and I am assured that their development team is taking care to improve.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Belton

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable rug.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as a gift to my son for his bathroom. The grea color really fit well for the boys bathroom. The rug is very soft and comfy, use my son's word. Even though the wool is not as long as it shows in the picture, it is really give you the feeling as if stepping on wool.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: Soaks up water quickly!
customer_reviews.text: This rug is amazing! After standing on my old rug after getting out of the shower, my old rug would stay wet for what seemed like forever. This rugs perfect and dries quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle H

customer_reviews.title: It really doesn’t slip!
customer_reviews.text: It really doesn’t slip! This is a great bathmat, it doesn’t slip, dries quickly, and a super soft on the feet. I’ve already washed it several times and it seems to be holding up perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: SarahKay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great in front of shower. Nice gray that matches bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Season

customer_reviews.title: Secure and comfy
customer_reviews.text: This works very well for me. It does not skid at all and it's very soft and comfortable. The backing does appear to be flimsy, so I plan to treat it very gently when I need to wash it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas C.

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and nonskid
customer_reviews.text: This looks just like it is pictured, but I thought chenille was cotton and missed the microfiber descriptor. It works and is the size of a mat and not a big carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Miz Bee

customer_reviews.title: Thin but a nice mat
customer_reviews.text: Matches the new bathroom decor. Not very soft or plush. My old fom mat was more comfortable. But still a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Spinclassdoctor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and super absorbent
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to step out on after a long bath or shower!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Dries fast. Feels good. Looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Dries pretty quickly. Bottom of the pad sticks to the floor well, which is good, don't have to worry about it slipping out beneath you.
customer_reviews.author: Maximus L

customer_reviews.title: Quick dry!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bath mats. They do the job and dry quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Carp

customer_reviews.title: I use to have a memory foam bath mat and ...
customer_reviews.text: I use to have a memory foam bath mat and it would take forever to dry! this one drys instantly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This has made an excellent replacement.
customer_reviews.text: This is very soft, and seems to dry rather well. You should have seen how nasty my roommates mat was when I moved in! This has made an excellent replacement.
customer_reviews.author: TheBlueLotus

customer_reviews.title: Best bath mat
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bath mat. Doesn’t slip, perfect size, absorbs a lot of water and dries quickly. Pretty grey color. Great for the price. I am going to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie F.

customer_reviews.title: Finally a good mat, I purchased two already
customer_reviews.text: Finally a good mat , I purchased two already, and two more are on their way
customer_reviews.author: Liri

customer_reviews.title: Nice mat for price
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than it looks in the photo and slightly lavender hued. The mat is gray as advertised, it's just more of a warmer, purple toned gray than the cool-toned, heather gray in the picture. Quality is good though and I'm happy with the purchase given the price.
customer_reviews.author: SoCal Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Its soft and stays pretty dry. What else is there to say
customer_reviews.text: Its a bath mat. Its soft and stays pretty dry. What else is there to say. Great price and works
customer_reviews.author: J Perry

customer_reviews.title: Feels like cotton. Nice and absorbent
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected. Feels like cotton. Nice and absorbent. Looks terrific

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I really like it, it washes up beautifully and looks great.

customer_reviews.title: Good price too
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2, and they seem to do the job of absorbing water around the shower area. Good price too.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bui

customer_reviews.title: Nice bath mat
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this rug is great! It isn't plush (of course) but is soft to the touch. Love the grey color and non-slip back. The length is longer so it is rectangular. It’s perfect for a small bathroom like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Manley

customer_reviews.title: ... mat for our puppy's training classes and it works great. Washes up well
customer_reviews.text: We actually use this as a training mat for our puppy's training classes and it works great. Washes up well.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: it is ok, but thinner than expected. not sure about the quality of the rubber underneath

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the quality. This rug is absorbent and color is as described.

customer_reviews.title: Good but small
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought but overall it's a nice bathroom rug. Mega soft!

customer_reviews.title: Ok buy
customer_reviews.text: These are good. Definitely very slippery- but cute and plush. Washed ok in washer.
customer_reviews.author: A_Allen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Soft bath mat. Really love Lifewit runners and mats. PERFECT

customer_reviews.title: I love this bath mat
customer_reviews.text: I love this bath mat, it’s very clean and soft,non slip and also use in kitchen,easy to clean with machine, best choice!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ng

customer_reviews.title: Feels great, dries quick!
customer_reviews.text: Feels great on your feet and dries quickly! Just what we needed.

customer_reviews.title: Works and looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great and the rubber bottom keeps it planted firmly.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Feels really comfortable on th feet. Looks nice as well, will be ordering another great one

customer_reviews.title: Cute soft bath mat
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this, it is soft, the quality seems good, I would buy again, good value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So cushy, and dries so well. So fluffy, the kitty wants to sleep on it!
